body:
/* declare variables */
DECLARE @variable INT

DECLARE $cursor_name$ CURSOR FAST_FORWARD READ_ONLY FOR $select_statement$

OPEN $cursor_name$

FETCH NEXT FROM $cursor_name$ INTO @variable

WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN
    $CURSOR$

    FETCH NEXT FROM $cursor_name$ INTO @variable
END

CLOSE $cursor_name$
DEALLOCATE $cursor_name$
